## 1. NEXT_PHRASE
"What time is your meeting?"

## 2. AI_RESPONSE
I have **a** meeting tomorrow.

## 3. CORRECTIONS
[{
    "original": "I have meeting tomorrow"
    "corrected": "I have a meeting tomorrow",
    "explanation": ["Grammar", "Missing article 'a' before noun 'meeting'"]
    "error_type": "GRAMMAR"  // Missing comma, broken JSON
}]
